instance_template: cpu("Ryzen9", 95). cpu("i7", 85). cpu("M1", 70). gpu("RTX3070", 90). gpu("RX6700XT", 88). gpu("IrisXe", 65). cooler("AirCool", 20). cooler("LiquidCool", 40). cooler("PassiveCool", 5). high_perf("Ryzen9"). high_perf("RTX3070"). discrete_gpu("RTX3070"). discrete_gpu("RX6700XT").
generator: 1 { selected_cpu(C) : cpu(C, P) } 1. 1 { selected_gpu(G) : gpu(G, P) } 1. 1 { selected_cooler(K) : cooler(K, P) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: A central processing unit designated as a high-performance component necessitates the integration of a liquid cooling system.
A graphical processing unit designated as a high-performance component necessitates the integration of a liquid cooling system.
The utilization of passive cooling systems is strictly prohibited when a discrete graphical processing unit is selected.
The RX6700XT graphical processing unit is incompatible with systems utilizing the M1 central processing unit.

soft_constraints.description: The system configuration should be optimized to maximize the cumulative performance rating of the selected components.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("TotalPerformance", (C,G,K), S) :- selected_cpu(C), cpu(C,P1), selected_gpu(G), gpu(G,P2), selected_cooler(K), cooler(K,P3), S = P1 + P2 + P3.
